trial_type.Description: Event type. Most of each run was spent watching a single movie, with short fixation periods before and after.

Levels.fixation: fixation cross before or after the movie

stim_name.Description: Name of the movie shown in this run. All participants viewed the same four movies in the same order: run 1: 1.2.3; run 2: 6.3.9; run 3: 3.1.3; run 4: 2.4.1. Stimuli files are available at https://osf.io/v562e/ (DOI 10.17605/OSF.IO/3EMBR).
